TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CanonicalTrackedOutputFiles extends System.Object

summary.span: 此类是采用规范格式的 .write. 跟踪日志的

span.span: This class is the file tracking log interpreter for .write.

summary.span: 跟踪使用规范格式 Canonical .write 的日志。

span.span: tracking logs in canonical form Canonical .write.

summary.span: 日志需要固定，因为输出需要与输入相关联。

span.span: logs need to be rooted, since the outputs need to be associated with an input.

summary.span: 无参数构造函数。

span.span: Parameterless constructor.
